attributes.action: Students in England should receive advanced information for their A levels 2023
attributes.additional_details: This will allow for students in England to relieve equal treatment in their A-level exams as students in the other nations in the UK.
attributes.background: Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland assemblies have given A-level students advanced information in their upcoming exams, the petition is based on this being extended to students taking their exams in 2023 in England. This will allow for students to preform better and a allow for a fairer system.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632547
